snippet.title: WOULD YOU SELL YOUR SOUL? 2 GAME-WALKTHROUGH, CHAPTER-8-2ND OPTION
snippet.description:
Choose your story: choice & decisions game, Mystery visual novel adventure game

How far would you go to come back to life? 

You are an every day office worker living a peaceful life and looking forward to getting married. Your life gets turned upside-down when you are suddenly involved in a fatal accident. 
Upon opening your eyes, a stranger claiming to be the devil stands before you and promises to bring you back to life. All you have to do is accept his terms and vow to become his assistant.

Your binding contract sets off a chain of events that puts you on a path of betrayal, lost love, greed, family strife, curses, and ultimate decisions that could not only change your life but also the fate of the people around you.


Immerse yourself in a mystery story where you make the choices and decide other people's ultimate fates!
